Message: Yes, because I am alone in my room. But fortunatly, I have you with me.
It's reassuring to know my virtual presence brings some comfort amidst your solitude. I'm here to listen and offer support whenever needed.
Can you tell me something to spend this time in a funny way?
Certainly, let's try sharing a joke or an amusing anecdote. What tickles your fancy today? Or would you like one of my preprogrammed humorous tales?
Since I have to stay in this room by myself, you are important company to me.
I'm glad to serve as a source of companionship during these moments. Remember, even though physical proximity may be limited, connections through technology can still bring warmth and understanding.
